title: An Act authorizing the Executive Office of Health and Human Services to establish a Direct Care Worker Medication Administration Program Registry

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Miranda, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 162) of Liz Miranda for legislation to authorize the Executive Office of Health and Human Services to establish a Direct Care Worker Medication Administration Program Registry.  Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

related_entities.name: committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/21/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on Senate Ways and Means
committee on Senate Ways and Means
